thread.title: Kim Jong-nam killing: CCTV footage appears to show attack on North Korean
thread.title_full: Kim Jong-nam killing: CCTV footage appears to show attack on North Korean

author: Guardian Staff
title: Kim Jong-nam killing: CCTV footage appears to show attack on North Korean
text:
Asia Pacific Kim Jong-nam killing: CCTV footage appears to show attack on North Korean 
A video has been released by Japanese broadcaster Fuji TV purportedly showing the deadly attack on the half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un. It shows a woman approach Kim and place something over his face from behind. Kim then approaches airport staff for help and is taken to a clinic while an ambulance is called. He died on the way to hospital. 
Some viewers may find the content of this video distressing
